Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth

Interface Summary
AccountWatcher.AccountRemoved  
 

Class Summary
AccountWatcher This class acts as a listener for the account removal event.
AuthenticatorService The service used for taking care of authentication for a Salesforce-based application.
HttpAccess Generic HTTP Access layer - used internally by RestClient and OAuth2.
HttpAccess.Execution Wrapper around an HTTP call and its response.
HttpAccess.GzipDecompressingEntity Entity wrapper for compressed (gzip-ped) or non-compressed entities
OAuth2 Helper methods for common OAuth2 requests.
OAuth2.AbstractResponse Helper classes to parse responses
OAuth2.IdServiceResponse Helper class to parse an identity service response.
OAuth2.TokenEndpointResponse Helper class to parse a token refresh response.
OAuth2.TokenErrorResponse Helper class to parse a token refresh error response.
 

Exception Summary
HttpAccess.NoNetworkException Thrown when offline during an attempted http call
OAuth2.OAuthFailedException Exception thrown when refresh fails.
